problem_names:
lemma cat_CAT_components:
  shows "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_cfs \<alpha>"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = 
      (\<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs (dg_CAT \<alpha>). \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>0\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>C\<^sub>F \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>)"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<CC>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}. cf_id \<CC>)"

lemmas_with [folded cat_smc_CAT, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  \<comment>\<open>Digraph\<close>
  cat_CAT_ObjI = smc_CAT_ObjI
  and cat_CAT_ObjD = smc_CAT_ObjD
  and cat_CAT_ObjE = smc_CAT_ObjE
  and cat_CAT_Obj_iff[cat_CAT_simps] = smc_CAT_Obj_iff  
  and cat_CAT_Dom_app[cat_CAT_simps] = smc_CAT_Dom_app
  and cat_CAT_Cod_app[cat_CAT_simps] = smc_CAT_Cod_app
  and cat_CAT_is_arrI = smc_CAT_is_arrI
  and cat_CAT_is_arrD = smc_CAT_is_arrD
  and cat_CAT_is_arrE = smc_CAT_is_arrE
  and cat_CAT_is_arr_iff[cat_CAT_simps] = smc_CAT_is_arr_iff

lemmas_with [folded cat_smc_CAT, unfolded slicing_simps, unfolded cat_smc_CAT]: 
  \<comment>\<open>Semicategory\<close>
  cat_CAT_Comp_vdomain = smc_CAT_Comp_vdomain
  and cat_CAT_composable_arrs_dg_CAT = smc_CAT_composable_arrs_dg_CAT
  and cat_CAT_Comp = smc_CAT_Comp
  and cat_CAT_Comp_app[cat_CAT_simps] = smc_CAT_Comp_app
  and cat_CAT_Comp_vrange = smc_CAT_Comp_vrange

lemmas_with (in \<Z>) [folded cat_smc_CAT, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  \<comment>\<open>Semicategory\<close>
  cat_CAT_obj_initialI = smc_CAT_obj_initialI
  and cat_CAT_obj_initialD = smc_CAT_obj_initialD
  and cat_CAT_obj_initialE = smc_CAT_obj_initialE
  and cat_CAT_obj_initial_iff[cat_CAT_simps] = smc_CAT_obj_initial_iff
  and cat_CAT_obj_terminalI = smc_CAT_obj_terminalI
  and cat_CAT_obj_terminalE = smc_CAT_obj_terminalE
translations:
lemma cat_CAT_components:
  shows "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_cfs \<alpha>"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = 
      (\<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs (dg_CAT \<alpha>). \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>0\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>C\<^sub>F \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>)"
    and "cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<CC>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}. cf_id \<CC>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>} &&&
     cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_cfs \<alpha> &&&
     cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> =
     (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)) &&&
    cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>) &&&
    cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
      (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>) &&&
    cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr> =
    VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}) dghm_id

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ([ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
       (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
         \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
         \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
      VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)))
       dghm_id]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>} &&&
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
       (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
         \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
         \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
      VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)))
       dghm_id]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
     all_cfs \<alpha> &&&
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
       (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
         \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
         \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
      VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)))
       dghm_id]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>2\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
     (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
      (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
     VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)))
      dghm_id]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>3\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
      (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
     VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)))
      dghm_id]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>4\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
      (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<GG>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>composable_arrs
      (dg_CAT \<alpha>).
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>H\<^sub>M
        \<GG>\<FF>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
     VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)))
      dghm_id]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>5\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    VLambda (ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}) dghm_id

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. vsv (cat_smc (cat_CAT \<alpha>))

    \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (smc_CAT \<alpha>)

       a \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<D>\<^sub>\<circ>

       cat_smc (cat_CAT \<alpha>)\<lparr>a\<rparr> =
       smc_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>a\<rparr>

proof (state)
goal (9 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<beta>
 2. vfsequence (cat_CAT \<alpha>)
 3. vsv (cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr>)
 4. vcard (cat_CAT \<alpha>) = 6\<^sub>\<nat>
 5. tiny_semicategory \<beta> (cat_smc (cat_CAT \<alpha>))
 6. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr>) =
    cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 7. \<And>a.
       a \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> cat_CAT
                              \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
       cat_CAT
        \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr>\<lparr>a\<rparr> : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>cat_CAT \<alpha>\<^esub> a
 8. \<And>a b f.
       f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>cat_CAT \<alpha>\<^esub> b \<Longrightarrow>
       cat_CAT
        \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr>\<lparr>b\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>cat_CAT \<alpha>\<^esub>
       f =
       f
 9. \<And>b c f.
       f : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>cat_CAT \<alpha>\<^esub> c \<Longrightarrow>
       f \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>cat_CAT \<alpha>\<^esub>
       cat_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>CId\<rparr>\<lparr>b\<rparr> =
       f
